ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder
Class RecipeController

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder.RecipeController

public class RecipeController
extends java.lang.Object

Writes and deletes recipes to the local database (cache) and the webservice. Also contains the logic that determines if the device is connected to the internet. Without internet access, no Recipes write to the webservice.

Author:
gcoomber
